backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report describing feature requirements, affected files, and components for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend source paths to short functional summaries of each component or page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining color system, radius, and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML root document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with landing, client, partner, and internal routes plus a custom 404 page.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Footer: Simple footer with logo and copyright line.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Header: Sticky header with responsive logos and navigation buttons including scroll-to-layanan.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Hero.t: Standalone hero section with image, headline, description, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/JoinTe: Section inviting users to join the team with a button linking to partner registration.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Landin: Full landing layout including custom hero, informational sections, and collapsible pricing cards, plus header and footer components.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/layana: Exports static array of service package definitions including pricing, details, and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Layana: Renders an accordion list of service tiers using layananData, displaying details and a WhatsApp action button.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Penutu: Simple closing section showing a centered message about service quality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining CSS variables for themes and applying global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/client/LoginClient.ts: UI page for client login with mock Internet Identity button and navigation to registration.
frontend/src/pages/client/RegisterClient: Client registration form that shows a confirmation message after submission.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login page with mock Internet Identity login and role-based entry options.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Internal registration form that collects user info and role, shows a confirmation screen after submission, and navigates to internal login.
UI-only partner login page with placeholder login buttons and navigation to the partner registration page.
frontend/src/pages/partner/RegisterPartn: Partner registration form collecting basic info and showing a confirmation screen before navigating back to login.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking landing page requirements, constraints, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features.
